channel.title: Help ...Please... Don't Know Whats Wrong With Is , It was all good yesterday!
channel.description: I need help , yesterday i port forwarded , it all worked my server was up and running , there was ober 30 people on it , but when i woke up today in the morning and tried to run the server no one was able to get on with ip and port? I don't know whats the problem because it all worked yesterday? My ip is dragonsisle.no-ip.org and port 43594..... Please Help... God why do i always have to have problems.. :mad:

item.title: Help ...Please... Don't Know Whats Wrong With Is , It was all good yesterday!
item.dc:creator: @Dxmaster Dxmaster
item.description:
@Dxmaster wrote:

I didn’t download DNS Client? What is that And where can i download it?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 07:22:18 AM[/size][hr] Is it a program , for updating my no-ip?

Read full topic
item.source: Help ...Please... Don't Know Whats Wrong With Is , It was all good yesterday!

item.title: Help ...Please... Don't Know Whats Wrong With Is , It was all good yesterday!
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Dxmaster:

What you mean i have to go to www.no-ip.com and update the ip? Cuz my server is running but just that no one can get on…

No no…When you downloaded the DNS client for no-ip…go to it, check it for updates on it and do it while runeserv.bat

Read full topic

You have to open/update no-ip again through the thing you downloaded to use. I think during you do runserv.bat
